Description:
Idyllic Charm in Humber Hill!
Sale by Set Date 29/6/2015
Owner occupiers of all ages and investors are going to want to act quickly to secure this two-year young, impeccably presented, single level villa residing in 'Humber Hill', a quality collection of modern homes set close to admired amenities.
Showcasing an elegant decor, the homes generous interiors feature high ceilings and a plethora of large, north facing windows saturating the free flowing living and meals space in natural light, while providing stunning outlooks of the treed vista and hills in the distance.
